turkish_example_sentence: Ben projeye erken başlamışsam, zamanında bitmiş olurdu.
english_example_sentence: If I had begun the project earlier, it would have finished on time.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы я начал проект раньше, он был бы закончен вовремя.
